name: Quality Inspection DFM
query:
Select 
  pi.quality_inspection as "QC No",
  pr.posting_date as "QC:Date",
  pr.name as "MRN No",
  pr.posting_date as "MRN Date:Date",
  pr.gate_entry_no as "Gate Entry  no",
  pr.date as "Gate Entry Date:Date:100",
  pr.supplier as "Party Name",
  pr.supplier_bill_no as "Party Bill/Challan No",
  pr.date as "Party Bill/Challan Date:Date",
  pi.item_name as "Item Name",
  pi.item_code as "Item Code",
  pi.item_group as "Item Group",
  pi.batch_no as "Batch No",
  qi.acc_qty as "MRN Base Qty:Float:100",
  qi.approved_quantity as "Approved Qty:Float:100",
  qi.rejected_qty as "Rejected Qty:Float:100",
  qi.inspected_by as "Inspected By",
  qr.specification  as "Parameter",
  qr.status as "Grade",
  qr.value as "Observed Result",
  qi.remarks as "Remarks"
  
  
 
from `tabPurchase Receipt` pr,`tabPurchase Receipt Item` pi , `tabQuality Inspection` qi , `tabQuality Inspection Reading`qr
 WHERE
   pi.parent=pr.name and
   pi.quality_inspection = qi.name and
   qr.parent= qi.name
